mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into base_tree (id, enabled, `operator`, remark, `valid`, css, index_, is_parent, `name`, target, `type`, url, parent_id, created_date, modified_date, expire_date ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{css,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=BINARY}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=BINARY}, #{expireDate,jdbcType=BINARY} )
mapper.update: update base_tree set enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `valid` = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT}, css = #{css,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, index_ = #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_parent = #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=BINARY}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=BINARY}, expire_date = #{expireDate,jdbcType=BINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, enabled, `operator`, remark, `valid`, css, index_, is_parent, `name`, target, `type`, url, parent_id, created_date, modified_date, expire_date from base_tree where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, enabled, `operator`, remark, `valid`, css, index_, is_parent, `name`, target, `type`, url, parent_id, created_date, modified_date, expire_date from base_tree
